title: Dia 5 Top/Jung. LF Diamond/Platinum team or New team wanting to get Diamond/Platinum in ranked 5v5s
body:
I have around 2k ranked games under my belt and Main Top and Jungle. IGN: Nikita50111
Current Rank: Diamond 5

replies.body:
Hey mate, I will try to contact you in game,
My name is Iceagle, my friend GoW Russian Dan and I are looking to start a brand new ranked team, our current ranks for solo queue are Diamond 5 and Platinum 3 Respectively, however we both used to play for a challenger ranked team for about 6 months before disbanding.

What we are looking for a player in the team is that they are committed to the ranked team that is prepared to practice on agreed schedules set by each player of the team (you get to choose when to practice but you must show up). We will be spending time together doing normal games, arams, customs, vods of our game prepays, and if within close location we can meet up for in-house lan sessions and extra curricular activities.

In the future we aim to get this team to challenger and have a goal set for 12 months once we have a first roster started. We also have plans later down the track for coaching opportunities, both for our team and transitioning our team into an organisation that provides coaching for lower ranked players and hosting teams of lower ranks within the organisation. Also quite possibly later down the track we might implement a guide system for our organisation to share mechanics of champions with players across the world that players within our team would have wrote themselves, this should help each other in the team with mechanical skill and mechanical awareness and anyone else in the organisation or persons with access to where we will store the information.

Please let me know if you are interested in this kind of ranked team, If you are, shoot me up an add on league of legends and I will chat with you soon.

Thankyou

Iceagle.

OMG do not join a team with GoW russiandan he is possibly the biggest sook I've ever met. I said lol and then he started abusing me and calling me Imature, spoilt, a brat, a child, a little bitch all because I said "lol". His last team which I was on all decided we had enough of him so we kicked him out so we didn't have to put up with his short temper and constraint complaining. If you decided to join his team then best of luck but I highly advise against it.
